PageTitle: reset ip urpf discard statistics interface
FuncDef: The reset ip urpf discard statistics interface command resets the statistics on the packets that fail the URPF check and are discarded on an interface.
CLIs: reset ip urpf discard statistics interface { <interface-type> <interface-num> | <interface-name> | all }
Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ip urpf discard statistics interface all
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Running reset ip urpf discard statistics interface command resets the statistics on the packets that fail the URPF check and are discarded on an interface. Therefore, confirm the action before running the reset ip urpf discard statistics interface command.
